title: Changing legal representative
h1: Do you want to change your legal representative?
legalRepresentativeChange: Yes, I confirm I want to change my legal representative.
legalRepresentativeRemove: Yes, I confirm I wish to remove my legal representative and continue my case representing myself.

legalRep.required: Please select at least one of the options below
legalRep.backEndError: There was an error while removing your legal representative. Please try again. If this error persists please contact support.
